title: Lux's Lucent Singularity is bugged
body: Lux's Lucent Singularity or her "e" when she casts that circle sphere to some place, on it's travel it is almost invisible. This makes it extremely difficult to see and dodge based on the animation. The only part you can see which is a slight distortion of picture of what ever it is traveling across, then it is almost invisible until a second after it has landed until it lights up.

replies.body: Trying to dodge Lux's E? What elo is this?

Not to mention that the AoE indicator is smaller than the actual blast radius.

She really needs to be looked at
Hate that whore. 30-40 cd on her ult.

Restart your client and see if it still looks like that.
More often than not your game has just glitched out. 

I had a similar experience the other day; Luc ult was completely invis except for little bursts at the end of his gun. 

If that's not it, then I don't know.
Nidalee's spear is like this to, you can only see the tip of it.
